message.body: Remember I mentioned the recruiter from Vantage who contacted me on Facebook saying they're looking for a Computational Linguist?
I messaged him back out of curiosity and someone else got back to me in 30 minutes saying they want to schedule a phone call.
Ah! What does this mean? Is this something you would leave LDC for?
I don't know. They would have to pay very well
Well enough to make up for Penn benefits
Ok. Keep me updated!
Okay
Where is vantage?
It's in PA, about 30-50 minutes away.
Apparently they have offices in Europe and Asia too.
Ok. Don't tell me that. Haha.
Money to go back to school is a big thing. Oh. I'm nervous for you!
Yeah ha ha I'm just going to see
If they pay more and I can get programming experience through work instead of classes, that might be better
Haha. I know. So unlike me ;)
I'll explain myself further when I see you tonight. Haha.
Oh there's a backstory?
A bit. Yeah. Haha.
I'm very curious
It's nothing scandalous. Haha.
I'm still curious.
I know. How's work?
It's okay. I just want to leave of course
On my lunch break I finished putting everything I have on the flash drive. 35 documents total.
How's work for you?

I also want to leave, of course. It's not too bad. Just my general anxiety about being here. And you know how my back spasmed this morning? I walked my back on a bedside table so know it hurts. I just want to lie flat.
*Wacked
Ohh man, someone's gonna need a back rub for sure
Yes. Haha. But you know it never lasts long for me.
I know
Oh man. I gotta get back to work. 30 minutes is too short. I really can't wait to see you tonight.
I can't wait either. See you soon.
Haha. You're cute. Fancy.
Haha I was hoping somebody would get it.
Ok. Jenny's apathetic attitude about potentially delaying a whole year of getting into nursing school is somehow found by phuong to be a great attitude. Really?
I know... I mean, look at her
